features.additionalInfo: No fees for accessing your account online or via phone banking.
No monthly access fee.
No minimum balance.

eligibility.additionalInfo: You must be a member. Membership is open to current or retired employees of the Australian education sector or family members of members (i.e. shareholders) of the Bank.

eligibility.additionalValue: Individuals must be citizens or permanent residents of Australia.

fees.name: PAPER_STATEMENT_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: This fee applies when you have elected to receive a paper statement by post in addition to a statement available to view and download in internet banking. It is in addition to fees for replacement and additional statements. For credit cards, this fee is debited to credit card account on the 7th day of the month after the end of a statement period. For all other accounts, this fee is debited to transaction, savings or loan account in that order on the 15th day of the month after the end of a statement period. Exceptions apply. For more information please refer to our Fees and Charges brochure.

eligibility.additionalInfo: The Paper Statement fee does not apply if you were a member and have not resigned your membership or the Bank has not terminated your membership before 1 November 2018; you opened an account with us and have not closed that account before 1 November 2018; or you are under 18 years of age.

listData.name: Term Deposit for Customers
listData.description: Take advantage of great returns on our term deposits.

features.additionalInfo: No account keeping fee
A guaranteed rate for terms from 3 to 36 months
Earn a competitive interest rate on your investment with a minimum opening balance of $1,000 can get you started.
Interest can be paid monthly, 12 monthly or at maturity.
For deposits of $500,000 and over, rates are by negotiation and subject to acceptance.
We'll send you a written renewal notice before your deposit matures.

If you want to withdraw your Term Deposit before it matures you'll need to give us 31 days' notice. A reduced rate of interest will apply in these circumstances. For full details refer to our Conditions of Use.

constraints.additionalInfo: For deposits of $500,000 and over, rates are by negotiation and subject to acceptance.

listData.name: Your Way Plus Fixed Interest Only Home Loan Investor
listData.description: Get flexibility for your investment PLUS take advantage of our package benefits with special low rates interest only option and much more. Lock in a rate for upto 5 years.

features.additionalInfo: Redraw available
Additional repayments available
Ability to split loan
Ability to switch loan
Ability to Top Up
24/7 access via internet banking, mobile app, phone banking
Borrow up to 90% of the property value prior to capitalisation of Lenders Mortgage Insurance
Discounted Variable rates for life of the loan
PLUS 100% offset
PLUS establishment, valuation and top up fees waived
PLUS personal loan application fees waived
PLUS 10% off home and contents insurance (Allianz)

eligibility.additionalInfo: You must be a member. Firefighters Mutual Bank is for current or retired employees of, or current volunteers with, a fire and/or emergency service and their families, and is completely owned by its members.

eligibility.additionalValue: Individuals must be citizens of permanent residents of Australia.

eligibility.additionalInfo: All applications for credit are subject to responsible lending criteria. Fees and charges apply. You can find our Consumer Lending terms and conditions online or from any of our offices.
Borrower must have satisfied Your Way Plus Home Loan Package eligibility.

fees.name: MORTGAGE_DISCHARGE
fees.additionalInfo: For preparation of discharge documentation on your written request. $250 in NSW and at cost in other states. At Cost.

fees.name: ADDITIONAL_SECURITY_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Fee applies for each additional security taken.

fees.name: ACCOUNT_FUNCTIONS
fees.additionalInfo: $2.50 for each increment up to 3 minutes. Payable at the time the service is provided.

fees.name: ARREARS_ADMINISTRATION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable each time staff action a loan account, RediCredit or Credit Card account in arrears.

fees.name: DEFAULT_NOTICE_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we send you a default notice asking you to remedy a default under your credit contract.

fees.name: PAPER_STATEMENT_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: This fee applies when you have elected to receive a paper statement by post in addition to a statement available to view and download in internet banking. It is in addition to fees for replacement and additional statements. For credit cards, this fee is debited to credit card account on the 7th day of the month after the end of a statement period. For all other accounts, this fee is debited to transaction, savings or loan account in that order on the 15th day of the month after the end of a statement period. Exceptions apply. For more information please refer to our Fees and Charges brochure.

eligibility.additionalInfo: The Paper Statement fee does not apply if you were a member and have not resigned your membership or the Bank has not terminated your membership before 1 November 2018; you opened an account with us and have not closed that account before 1 November 2018; or you are under 18 years of age.

fees.name: LEGAL_FEES
fees.additionalInfo: For third party professional services used in the preparation of non-standard documents. At Cost.

fees.name: LENDERS_MORTGAGE_INSURANCE
fees.additionalInfo: If you have less than the required deposit, we may ask you to pay Lender's Mortgage Insurance (LMI). LMI protects the bank in cases of default. The LMI premium is not a bank fee. At Cost.

fees.name: REGISTRATION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: A government charge, payable if and when there is a need to register, transfer or discharge an interest on the Certificate of Title. At Cost.

fees.name: TITLE_SEARCH
fees.additionalInfo: Fee applies for additional title searches that may be required in addition to those already included in the Establishment fee and Top up fee. At Cost.

fees.name: COLLECTION_CHARGES
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we request an agent to assist our efforts to address defaults under your contract before we can commence legal action. At Cost.

fees.name: STAMP_DUTY
fees.additionalInfo: A government charge payable to State revenue office when we need to stamp your mortgage to accommodate credit provided under this contract at the amount payable under the relevant stamp duty scale. At Cost.

fees.name: PACKAGE_FEE-HOME_LOANS
fees.additionalInfo: Applicable for New loans after 1 August 2019. The package fee for your home loan will be debited from the nominated Everyday Direct account when your home loan is first approved and then on every anniversary thereafter until the end of your home loan.

fees.name: BREAK_FEE_(HOME_LOAN)
fees.additionalInfo: Payable on early repayment i.e. during the fixed rate period if you repay the loan in full, you repay part of the loan (except where additional payment threshold applies), you switch from this loan type to another loan type. At Cost.

fees.name: FIXED_RATE_LOCK_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if you choose to lock in an interest rate on your fixed rate loan. The interest rate is locked in for a period of up to 90 days from the date of application. The fee is applicable regardless of whether the interest rate at time of settlement has increased or decreased since the date of application. 0.15% of the total amount financed.

fees.name: FEE_FOR_FULL_VALUATION
fees.additionalInfo: A Full Valuation is where our external valuer physically attends the property to be mortgaged. The mortgage is our security for the loan. If we require a Full Valuation for more than one property, the Fee for Full Valuation is payable for each property offered as security for the loan. At Cost (Maximum $400) per security property.

fees.name: LOAN_ADMINISTRATION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for the processing and assessing of your home loan application and the preparation of your loan. Payable at the time of settlement/funding of your loan.

fees.name: LOAN_VARIATION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you apply to vary the terms of your loan. Payable when the variation is agreed between us.

eligibility.additionalInfo: All applications for credit are subject to responsible lending criteria. Fees and charges apply. You can find our Consumer Lending terms and conditions online or from any of our offices.
Borrower must have satisfied Your Way Plus Home Loan Package eligibility.

fees.name: MORTGAGE_DISCHARGE
fees.additionalInfo: For preparation of discharge documentation on your written request. $250 in NSW and at cost in other states. At Cost.

fees.name: ADDITIONAL_SECURITY_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Fee applies for each additional security taken.

fees.name: ACCOUNT_FUNCTIONS
fees.additionalInfo: $2.50 for each increment up to 3 minutes. Payable at the time the service is provided.

fees.name: ARREARS_ADMINISTRATION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable each time staff action a loan account, RediCredit or Credit Card account in arrears.

fees.name: DEFAULT_NOTICE_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we send you a default notice asking you to remedy a default under your credit contract.

fees.name: PAPER_STATEMENT_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: This fee applies when you have elected to receive a paper statement by post in addition to a statement available to view and download in internet banking. It is in addition to fees for replacement and additional statements. For credit cards, this fee is debited to credit card account on the 7th day of the month after the end of a statement period. For all other accounts, this fee is debited to transaction, savings or loan account in that order on the 15th day of the month after the end of a statement period. Exceptions apply. For more information please refer to our Fees and Charges brochure.

eligibility.additionalInfo: The Paper Statement fee does not apply if you were a member and have not resigned your membership or the Bank has not terminated your membership before 1 November 2018; you opened an account with us and have not closed that account before 1 November 2018; or you are under 18 years of age.

fees.name: LEGAL_FEES
fees.additionalInfo: For third party professional services used in the preparation of non-standard documents. At Cost.

fees.name: LENDERS_MORTGAGE_INSURANCE
fees.additionalInfo: If you have less than the required deposit, we may ask you to pay Lender's Mortgage Insurance (LMI). LMI protects the bank in cases of default. The LMI premium is not a bank fee. At Cost.

fees.name: REGISTRATION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: A government charge, payable if and when there is a need to register, transfer or discharge an interest on the Certificate of Title. At Cost.

fees.name: TITLE_SEARCH
fees.additionalInfo: Fee applies for additional title searches that may be required in addition to those already included in the Establishment fee and Top up fee. At Cost.

fees.name: COLLECTION_CHARGES
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we request an agent to assist our efforts to address defaults under your contract before we can commence legal action. At Cost.

fees.name: STAMP_DUTY
fees.additionalInfo: A government charge payable to State revenue office when we need to stamp your mortgage to accommodate credit provided under this contract at the amount payable under the relevant stamp duty scale. At Cost.

fees.name: PACKAGE_FEE-HOME_LOANS
fees.additionalInfo: Applicable for New loans after 1 August 2019. The package fee for your home loan will be debited from the nominated Everyday Direct account when your home loan is first approved and then on every anniversary thereafter until the end of your home loan.

fees.name: BREAK_FEE_(HOME_LOAN)
fees.additionalInfo: Payable on early repayment i.e. during the fixed rate period if you repay the loan in full, you repay part of the loan (except where additional payment threshold applies), you switch from this loan type to another loan type. At Cost.

fees.name: FIXED_RATE_LOCK_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if you choose to lock in an interest rate on your fixed rate loan. The interest rate is locked in for a period of up to 90 days from the date of application. The fee is applicable regardless of whether the interest rate at time of settlement has increased or decreased since the date of application. 0.15% of the total amount financed.

fees.name: FEE_FOR_FULL_VALUATION
fees.additionalInfo: A Full Valuation is where our external valuer physically attends the property to be mortgaged. The mortgage is our security for the loan. If we require a Full Valuation for more than one property, the Fee for Full Valuation is payable for each property offered as security for the loan. At Cost (Maximum $400) per security property.

fees.name: LOAN_ADMINISTRATION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for the processing and assessing of your home loan application and the preparation of your loan. Payable at the time of settlement/funding of your loan.

fees.name: LOAN_VARIATION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you apply to vary the terms of your loan. Payable when the variation is agreed between us.

fees.additionalInfo: A government charge, payable if and when there is a need to register, transfer or discharge an interest on the Certificate of Title. At Cost.

fees.name: TITLE_SEARCH
fees.additionalInfo: Fee applies for additional title searches that may be required in addition to those already included in the Establishment fee and Top up fee. At Cost.

fees.name: COLLECTION_CHARGES
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we request an agent to assist our efforts to address defaults under your contract before we can commence legal action. At Cost.

fees.name: STAMP_DUTY
fees.additionalInfo: A government charge payable to State revenue office when we need to stamp your mortgage to accommodate credit provided under this contract at the amount payable under the relevant stamp duty scale. At Cost.

fees.name: PACKAGE_FEE-HOME_LOANS
fees.additionalInfo: Applicable for New loans after 1 August 2019. The package fee for your home loan will be debited from the nominated Everyday Direct account when your home loan is first approved and then on every anniversary thereafter until the end of your home loan.

fees.name: FEE_FOR_FULL_VALUATION
fees.additionalInfo: A Full Valuation is where our external valuer physically attends the property to be mortgaged. The mortgage is our security for the loan. If we require a Full Valuation for more than one property, the Fee for Full Valuation is payable for each property offered as security for the loan. At Cost (Maximum $400) per security property.

fees.name: LOAN_ADMINISTRATION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for the processing and assessing of your home loan application and the preparation of your loan. Payable at the time of settlement/funding of your loan.

fees.name: LOAN_VARIATION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you apply to vary the terms of your loan. Payable when the variation is agreed between us.

It is in addition to fees for replacement and additional statements. For credit cards, this fee is debited to credit card account on the 7th day of the month after the end of a statement period. For all other accounts, this fee is debited to transaction, savings or loan account in that order on the 15th day of the month after the end of a statement period. Exceptions apply. For more information please refer to our Fees and Charges brochure.

eligibility.additionalInfo: The Paper Statement fee does not apply if you were a member and have not resigned your membership or the Bank has not terminated your membership before 1 November 2018; you opened an account with us and have not closed that account before 1 November 2018; or you are under 18 years of age.

fees.name: FEE_FOR_FULL_VALUATION
fees.additionalInfo: A Full Valuation is where our external valuer physically attends the property to be mortgaged. The mortgage is our security for the loan. If we require a Full Valuation for more than one property, the Fee for Full Valuation is payable for each property offered as security for the loan. At Cost (Maximum $400) per security property.

fees.name: LEGAL_FEES
fees.additionalInfo: For third party professional services used in the preparation of non-standard documents. At Cost.

fees.name: LENDERS_MORTGAGE_INSURANCE
fees.additionalInfo: If you have less than the required deposit, we may ask you to pay Lender's Mortgage Insurance (LMI). LMI protects the bank in cases of default. The LMI premium is not a bank fee. At Cost.

fees.name: REGISTRATION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: A government charge, payable if and when there is a need to register, transfer or discharge an interest on the Certificate of Title. At Cost.

fees.name: TITLE_SEARCH
fees.additionalInfo: Fee applies for additional title searches that may be required in addition to those already included in the Establishment fee and Top up fee. At Cost.

fees.name: COLLECTION_CHARGES
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we request an agent to assist our efforts to address defaults under your contract before we can commence legal action. At Cost.

fees.name: STAMP_DUTY
fees.additionalInfo: A government charge payable to State revenue office when we need to stamp your mortgage to accommodate credit provided under this contract at the amount payable under the relevant stamp duty scale. At Cost.

fees.name: BREAK_FEE_(HOME_LOAN)
fees.additionalInfo: Payable on early repayment i.e. during the fixed rate period if you repay the loan in full, you repay part of the loan (except where additional payment threshold applies), you switch from this loan type to another loan type. At Cost.

fees.name: FIXED_RATE_LOCK_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if you choose to lock in an interest rate on your fixed rate loan. The interest rate is locked in for a period of up to 90 days from the date of application. The fee is applicable regardless of whether the interest rate at time of settlement has increased or decreased since the date of application. 0.15% of the total amount financed.

fees.name: LOAN_ADMINISTRATION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for the processing and assessing of your home loan application and the preparation of your loan. Payable at the time of settlement/funding of your loan.

fees.name: LOAN_VARIATION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you apply to vary the terms of your loan. Payable when the variation is agreed between us.

lendingRates.additionalInfo: Fixed Rate for 1 year. Comparison rates quoted are based on $150,000 for a term of 25 years. Rates apply to secured loans only. WARNING: This Comparison rate is true only for the examples given and may not include all fees and charges. Different terms, fees or other loan amounts might result in a different Comparison rate

fees.additionalInfo: For preparation of discharge documentation on your written request. $250 in NSW and at cost in other states. At Cost.

fees.name: ADDITIONAL_SECURITY_FEE

fees.name: DEFAULT_NOTICE_FEE

fees.name: PAPER_STATEMENT_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: This fee applies when you have elected to receive a paper statement by post in addition to a statement available to view and download in internet banking. eligibility.additionalInfo: The Paper Statement fee does not apply if you were a member and have not resigned your membership or the Bank has not terminated your membership before 1 November 2018; you opened an account with us and have not closed that account before 1 November 2018; or you are under 18 years of age.

fees.name: FEE_FOR_FULL_VALUATION
fees.additionalInfo: A Full Valuation is where our external valuer physically attends the property to be mortgaged. The mortgage is our security for the loan. fees.name: LEGAL_FEES
fees.additionalInfo: For third party professional services used in the preparation of non-standard documents. At Cost.

fees.name: LENDERS_MORTGAGE_INSURANCE
fees.additionalInfo: If you have less than the required deposit, we may ask you to pay Lender's Mortgage Insurance (LMI). LMI protects the bank in cases of default. The LMI premium is not a bank fee. At Cost.

fees.name: REGISTRATION_FEE

fees.name: TITLE_SEARCH

fees.name: COLLECTION_CHARGES
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we request an agent to assist our efforts to address defaults under your contract before we can commence legal action. At Cost.

fees.name: STAMP_DUTY
fees.additionalInfo: A government charge payable to State revenue office when we need to stamp your mortgage to accommodate credit provided under this contract at the amount payable under the relevant stamp duty scale. At Cost.

fees.name: LOAN_ADMINISTRATION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for the processing and assessing of your home loan application and the preparation of your loan. Payable at the time of settlement/funding of your loan.

fees.name: LOAN_VARIATION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you apply to vary the terms of your loan. Payable when the variation is agreed between us.

fees.name: ARREARS_ADMINISTRATION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable each time staff action a loan account, RediCredit or Credit Card account in arrears.

fees.name: LATE_PAYMENT_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable by debit to your account when the minimum payment on a Credit Card account is not received by the due date. Charged once per statement period.

fees.name: CARD_REPLACEMENT_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you request a replacement card.

fees.name: INTERNATIONAL_CONVERSION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: 2.90% of transaction value in $AUD collected by Cuscal Limited - 0.90% paid to Us; 1.00% retained by Cuscal; 1.00% paid to Visa International. Payable when you transact in a foreign currency using your Visa card either online or at a merchant point of sale (irrespective of where the transaction occurs; performed not in Australian Dollar; or overseas merchants transact in a foreign currency.)

fees.name: CASH_ADVANCES_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Visa Debit and Visa Credit card cash advances at other financial institutions in Australia and overseas. Individual bank branches may not offer this service and may charge additional fees (at cost).

fees.name: PAPER_STATEMENT_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: This fee applies when you have elected to receive a paper statement by post in addition to a statement available to view and download in internet banking. It is in addition to fees for replacement and additional statements. For credit cards, this fee is debited to credit card account on the 7th day of the month after the end of a statement period. For all other accounts, this fee is debited to transaction, savings or loan account in that order on the 15th day of the month after the end of a statement period. Exceptions apply. For more information please refer to our Fees and Charges brochure.

eligibility.additionalInfo: The Paper Statement fee does not apply if you were a member and have not resigned your membership or the Bank has not terminated your membership before 1 November 2018; you opened an account with us and have not closed that account before 1 November 2018; or you are under 18 years of age.

fees.name: DEFAULT_NOTICE_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we send you a default notice asking you to remedy a default under your credit contract.
